text: <!here|@here> <@U0EL0GLEL> and I ran over to ADX this morning and grabbed the card reader hardware so we can get things running on our bench. I had a chance to talk with the support folks for the hardware, so we have a better understanding of what it will take to get rolling.

I’m going to hack together a python script to do it all manually so we can get the sequence right, and <@U0EL0GLEL> is going to get an Arduino image together that will do the same that we can later lock down with the correct command sequence.

I’m digging on a side-idea that we might be able to cut out the Arduino and go straight-Python if we’re clever with a custom wiring harness. <@U0EL0GLEL>: I’ll come find you later to check my math. :slightly_smiling_face:
